title: Chicken and Leek Pie
content:
Chicken and Leek Pie is an item created by the Chef profession. The recipe for the meal can be found in the recipe book located within the Delectable Dab's kitchen and created by using raw chicken together with leeks and pastry on a preparation table and then cooked in an oven. Once baked, chicken and leek pies can either be sold to Head Chef for coins or delivered to various non-player characters as part of chef bounties taken up at the Chef's bounty board.


 * Basic Chicken and Leek Pie
 * Appetizing Chicken and Leek Pie
 * Fine Chicken and Leek Pie
 * Tasty Chicken and Leek Pie
